title: The Beatles - Yellow Submarine [mono remix 2011]
description:
This is a RESEED. I have a reason to believe that the original torrent uploaded about 8-9 hrs ago was corrupt.  

In order to make a solid MONO remix, the reference of sort is needed.  This time, the title ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œHey BulldogÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ from the double album ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œRock ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‹Å“nÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ Roll [US pressing/MONO] was taken as a starting point. The mid frequencies were sort of suppressed (1-3khz) making the vocals ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œpushed backÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ while the GeorgeÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s guitar and PaulÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s bass take the center stage.  The frequency matrix was copied and applied to all tracks.  In my opinion, ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œHey BulldogÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ was the best mono mix ever made.  However, the re-master version in ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œBeatles in Mono, Past Masters 2ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ doesnÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t have the punch and the kick of the bass, and the whole impression is sort of ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œairyÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ because of the unreasonable high frequencies boost.  

The process:

1. Applied the frequency curve of ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½Hey BulldogÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ MONO  to all tracks 
2.  Stereo converted to mono by simply mixing lef and right into a single center channel at 50%
3. Mid compression at about 10khz
4. Re-sampled for the smallest possible file siye while preserving the authenticity of frequency response and dynamics.  

If youÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢re going to listen to this on a high end surround sound system, youÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢re bound for a major disappointment.  Basic two channel stereo system will be more than enough to give you an exceptional listening pleasure.  

Enjoy
